name: Marina + Shafer
body:
Hey Tracey! My friend and I were browsing the internet archives and stumbled upon your page. We ended up watching some of your bike touring videos and commend you guys for the awesome progress and charity events you've done. We love your editing style and the positivity from your videos. We check in a couple of times a year just to see the cool adventures you share. Wishing you the best!

Your fans from Canada! <3
